Well, the first one which Angel identified is recognizing that you have two disorders.

I see patients all the time, who have been in treatment in the addiction system or in the mental-health system, and their second or co-occurring disorder has been missed or ignored for years, and they can't get well from one illness, because the other illness continues to stir things up.

The second thing is, I think people who have been suffering from two illnesses are often terribly demoralized.

Well, most people get their treatment in the public-addiction or the public-mental-health system, if they have long-term disorders of any kind.
